text: Læa xok lum chn khxng chan xey! Cng khxxphay thosʹ tx phracea khxng phwk than læw cng klabneuxklabtaw tx phraxngkh phraxngkh ca sng mekh(na fn) ma henux phwk than hı hlang na fn lng ma xyang hnak læa ca thrng pheim phlang pen thwi khun hı kæ phwk than læa phwk than læa phwk than xya phin hlang doy pen phu kratha phid”
